title: This year’s first Apple event is upon us — here’s how to watch it
content:
It’s almost time! Apple is holding its first event of the year — and it’s gonna be another virtual doozy. So, expect some snazzy drone shots of the Apple Campus, and maybe someone even walking on its roof. While all gadget aficionados are getting their analyst hats on, let’s cover the basics of the event. It’s going to be live-streamed on Apple.com and the company’s YouTube channel at: 10:00 AM PST 1:00 PM EST 6:00 PM GMT 7:00 PM CET 11.30 PM IST If you want to save all the headaches of actually visiting these websites, just bookmark this post,…

This story continues at The Next Web

Or just read more coverage about: Apple
description: Apple is hosting its first event of the year today, and we're expecting plenty of gadgets, including a new iPhone SE.
